definition: Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.english: Eat what thing to belong to individual psychokinesis problem, wash a face?
sentences.chinese: 喫什麼東西屬個人意志力問題，洗臉呢？

sentences.english: I've got enough will power to get you out of my life for good.
sentences.chinese: 我已經有了足夠的意志力來將你永遠驅除出我的生命。

sentences.english: How should the person raise his psychokinesis?
sentences.chinese: 人要怎麼提高自己的意志力？

sentences.english: You have limited reserves of willpower.
sentences.chinese: 你的意志力存量是有限的。

sentences.english: Fatalism is an excuse of the weak-willed.
sentences.chinese: 宿命論是那些缺乏意志力的弱者的藉口。

sentences.english: And he can't be sure if it's willpower or the wine.
sentences.chinese: 而後不知是意志力還是酒力的作用。

sentences.english: Full-strength willpower requires a full tank.
sentences.chinese: 徹底發揮意志力需要充分的儲備。

sentences.english: Overcoming his handicaps, Mao exuded an extraordinary willpower and determination.
sentences.chinese: 克服着病痛的毛散發出強大的決心和意志力。

sentences.english: When you mention the will power, every one knows it's important to a kid.
sentences.chinese: 一說到培養意志力，人人都知道這對小孩子很重要。

sentences.english: Without a certain degree of practical efficient force--compounded of will, which is the root, and wisdom, which is the
sentences.chinese: 實際的有效力量，以意志力爲根基，以智慧爲其枝幹。

sentences.english: The will actually contains the main switch which directs all the actions of the human organism.
sentences.chinese: 意志力實際上包含着指揮人體組織所有行動的總開關。

sentences.english: It could teach some of these self-control and willpower skills I’m talking about.
sentences.chinese: 它還可以教你我說過的一些自控能力和意志力。

sentences.english: With the staunch willpower, change into the innermost feeling to the actions.
sentences.chinese: 用頑強的意志力，把內心的自律意識化爲行動。

sentences.english: Be dynamic and open-mind, has strong willpower and good executive ability.
sentences.chinese: 性格活潑開朗，頑強的意志力和良好的執行力。

sentences.english: The experts in the camps say strong willpower is not enough for quitters.
sentences.chinese: 體驗營專家認爲，僅憑意志力是無法戒菸的。

sentences.english: Smiling and other mood-lifting activities help improve willpower.
sentences.chinese: 微笑以及其他提高情緒的行爲都能贊助增強意志力。
